name: Pamenda
description:
A 2d game where you fight with enemies. This game was made by Swendoz in 3 days with following the tutorial. The game was made using Unity and Photoshop was used for the illustrations. 
  • MOVE with W-A-S-D  & ⬅ - ⬆ - ➡ - ⬇.
  • AIM with mouse.
  • SHOOT with left click.
You can support me on Patreon. You can reach me on Twitter.  By the way, I know the drawings are bad.
